user_instruction: 'Tell John to send the team retreat proposal to me (susan@brighthorizonsms.com) and remind him he can check his Gmail and Notion for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi John,

Could you please forward the latest version of the team-retreat proposal to me at susan@brighthorizonsms.com when you get a moment? If you need to double-check any details, feel free to review the files in your Gmail and our Notion workspace.

Thanks for handling this!

Best,  
Susan

final_output:
Hi John,

Could you please forward the latest version of the team-retreat proposal to me at susan@brighthorizonsms.com when you get a moment? If you need to double-check any details, feel free to review the files in your Gmail and our Notion workspace.

Thanks for handling this!

Susan
